snippet: In a memo to its staff, the company announced a plan to double digital revenue to $800 million in 2020.
abstract: New York Times Company issues strategy memo detailing rigorous plan to double digital revenue to $800 million in 2020 from $400 million in 2014; partly focuses on increasing subscriptions and strengthening customer loyalty.
lead_paragraph: In a memo to its staff, the company announced a plan to double digital revenue to $800 million in 2020.

headline.main: Times Co. Outlines Strategy to Double Digital Revenue
headline.print_headline: The New York Times Company Outlines a Strategy to Double Its Digital Revenue
